statements: DELETE FROM ModelPerformance WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression';
DELETE FROM ModelPerformance WHERE model_id = 1 AND training_accuracy > 0.90;
DELETE FROM ModelPerformance WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression' AND recall < 0.80;

DELETE FROM model_evaluations WHERE evaluation_id = 100 AND model_id = 5;
DELETE FROM model_tracking WHERE tracking_id = 10 AND model_id = 3;
DELETE FROM evaluation_results WHERE precision < 0.7 OR recall < 0.6;
DELETE FROM validation_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'F1 Score';
DELETE FROM evaluation_results WHERE model_id = 3 AND evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM prediction_logs WHERE actual_label = 'spam' OR actual_label = 'ham';
